scripts.postinstall: npm run fix:randombytes:main; npm run fix:buffer; npm run fix:randombytes; npm run fix:vm:require:asn1; npm run fix:asn1:rename; npm run fix:bn:rename
scripts.fix:buffer: npm run fix:buffer:require; npm run fix:buffer:install
scripts.fix:buffer:install: npm run fix:buffer:install:urlsafe-base64; npm run fix:buffer:install:asn1; npm run fix:buffer:install:fernet; npm run fix:buffer:install:simple-asym; npm run fix:buffer:install:passit-sdk-js; npm run fix:buffer:install:randombytes; npm run fix:buffer:install:pem-jwk
scripts.fix:buffer:require: npm run fix:buffer:require:urlsafe-base64; npm run fix:buffer:require:fernet; npm run fix:buffer:require:simple-asym; npm run fix:buffer:require:passit-sdk-js:js; npm run fix:buffer:require:randombytes; npm run fix:buffer:require:passit-sdk-js:passit_sdk; npm run fix:buffer:require:pem-jwk
scripts.fix:buffer:require:fernet: find node_modules/ -path '*fernet/fernet.js' -exec sed -i.bak "s/require('urlsafe-base64');/require('urlsafe-base64'); var Buffer = require('buffer').Buffer;/" {} \;
scripts.fix:buffer:require:simple-asym: find node_modules/ -path '*simple-asymmetric-js/js/crypto.js' -exec sed -i.bak "s/require('fernet');/require('fernet'); var Buffer = require('buffer').Buffer;/" {} \;
scripts.fix:buffer:require:passit-sdk-js:js: find node_modules/ -path '*passit-sdk-js/js/hash.js' -exec sed -i.bak 's/"use strict";/"use strict"; var Buffer = require("buffer").Buffer;/' {} \;
scripts.fix:buffer:require:passit-sdk-js:passit_: find node_modules/ -path '*passit-sdk-js/passit_sdk/hash.js' -exec sed -i.bak 's/"use strict";/"use strict"; var Buffer = require("buffer").Buffer;/' {} \;
scripts.fix:buffer:require:randombytes: find node_modules/ -path '*randombytes/browser.js' -exec sed -i.bak "s/'use strict'/'use strict'; var Buffer = require('buffer').Buffer;/" {} \;
scripts.fix:buffer:require:pem-jwk: find node_modules/ -path '*pem-jwk/index.js' -exec sed -i.bak "s|require('./factor')|require('./factor'); var Buffer = require('buffer').Buffer;|" {} \;
scripts.fix:buffer:require:urlsafe-base64: find node_modules/ -path '*urlsafe-base64/lib/urlsafe-base64.js' -exec sed -i.bak 's|// None yet!|var Buffer = require("buffer").Buffer;|' {} \;
scripts.fix:randombytes: npm run fix:randombytes:install; npm run fix:randombytes:require
scripts.fix:randombytes:install: npm run fix:randombytes:install:pem-jwk; npm run fix:randombutes:install:fernet
scripts.fix:randombytes:require: npm run fix:randombytes:require:pem-jwk; npm run fix:randombytes:require:fernet
scripts.fix:asn1:rename: npm run fix:asn1:rename:folder; npm run fix:asn1:rename:package; npm run fix:asn1:rename:pem-jwk
scripts.fix:asn1:rename:folder: find node_modules/ -depth -type d -path '*/asn1.js' -execdir mv asn1.js asn1js \;
scripts.fix:bn:rename: npm run fix:bn:rename:folder; npm run fix:bn:rename:package; npm run fix:bn:rename:asn1
scripts.fix:bn:rename:folder: find node_modules/ -depth -type d -path '*/bn.js' -execdir mv bn.js  bnjs \;
